casebody.data:
SLAUGHTER
v.
SLAUGHTER 324P17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. November 14, 2017 Ralph S. Pennington, Attorney at Law, Wilmington, J. Albert Clyburn, Attorney at Law, for Slaughter, Martin T. John M. Martin, Attorney at Law, Winterville, Alexander C. Dale, Attorney at Law, Wilmington, for Slaughter, Nicole B.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 7th of November 2017 by Defendant to Withdraw Petition for Discretionary Review:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 14th of November 2017."
